hasMenuItem.name: Straight & Narrow Gin Cocktail- PEACH ELDERFLOWER
Dirty Laundry "Hush" Rose
hasMenuItem.description:
Aromas of strawberries. Rhubarb &
watermelon with subtle hints of candied fruit. The palate boasts of bright red apple, watermelon rind, & blood orange. It translates to a beautiful light to medium bodied wine with a crisp & balanced acidity on the finish.
750ml
13%
Okanagan Valley, BC

hasMenuItem.name: Open Cabernet Merlot
hasMenuItem.description:
The perfect blend of Merlot and
Cabernet Sauvignon to discover their sumptuous red berry fruit aromas and complex, long flavourful finish. Enjoy on its own or as a complement to grilled burgers, sausages or aged hard cheeses.
750ml
14%
Okanagan Valley, BC

hasMenuItem.name: Graffigna Malbec
hasMenuItem.description:
Profound and fruit forward aromas, with ripe red berries, sweet spices and a hint of black pepper backed by toasted notes from its oak aging. Structured and balanced, with ripe tannins and fresh acidity that leads to toasted and vanilla hints on the finish.
750ml
13.5%
Mendoza region, Argentina

hasMenuItem.name: See Ya Later Ranch "Poppy" Red Blend
hasMenuItem.description:
This red blend, a mix of unknown varieties is a sweet red that is best chilled before service. Notes of black cherry and green olives, vanilla, pipe tobacco and toasted spices lead to a light-medium bodied palate with good freshness to keep it lively.
750ml
13.9%
Okanagan Valley, BC

hasMenuItem.name: Open Sauvignon Blanc
hasMenuItem.description:
A dry, lighter bodied wine with good intensity and flavours and aromas of gooseberry, melon, pear and citrus with a medium finish.
750ml
13%
Okanagan Valley, BC

hasMenuItem.name: See Ya Later Ranch Pinot Gris
hasMenuItem.description:
Fresh stone fruit and zesty lemon
with a pop of fruit and spice. The oak and balanced fruit flavours give a nice mouthfeel, with soft acidity and a touch of minerality providing a long and fruity finish.
750ml
12.7%
Okanagan Valley, BC

review.reviewBody: Fantastic burger everytime and the Bin 17 Black and Blue  was no exception.  Best burgers on the app in Vancouver, hands down!

Since we discovered this resaurant we have been ordering weekly. The food is FRESH, and tasty and you can tell that real care had been taken to package the order. You are fast becoming our favourite restaurant in the neighbourhood.
Best burger i have had in years.. tasted good
Just ordered their 2 for 1 Bin 4 - The Heritage burgers and super good!! Very tasty and love the buns and sauce. Definitely will be ordering again, Cheers! ü•≥
Fries were overcooked and cold. Salad was okay. Chicken portion was so small and thin - definitely not worth the money.
